programme.title: America's exceptional weather
programme.short_synopsis: An examination of the bizarre weather across the United States in 1993.
programme.medium_synopsis: Examining an unseasonably hot San Francisco summer and why America's weather, drowning Missouri and parching Georgia, is in the wrong place and refusing to budge.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: America's exceptional weather

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
